author: 0xevan
content:
as per this message, https://discord.com/channels/595666850260713488/1222404182091497563/1227909541027516457

<@796686546476204042> been grinding away. A lot of the past couple weeks were spent educating myself on how the beacon chain works - blobs are pretty complex because they have unique parts between EL and CL

author: 0xevan
content: Recently did a lot of improvements to surface some important metrics - one is slot inclusion time (e.g. how many slots from when a blob is first submitted to when a blob is finalized on beacon chain)

author: 0xevan
content:
If you are interested in seeing what I've done so far, I've split things into two repositories:
- backend https://github.com/Evan-Kim2028/ethpandaops_python
- "frontend"/analytics https://github.com/Evan-Kim2028/eip4844_blob_data
